TopicTitle: Could swear I've done this before.

Articles.Content:
Hey Hey, I'm Billy

I'm an Animation and Visual Effects Uni student so anything Max or Maya just PM me with any queries / model requests.

I'm currently learning Cryengine 3 as part of my curriculum but cant use any of those skills here sin KSP runs on Unity doesn't it.

Currently having to resist the urge to play KSP like I used to as it's destracting me from uni work.

To make money when I'm not at uni I'm a freelance lighting programmer which basicly means that I make lights turn on at specific parts of a play.

Not really got much more to say.

Guessing there's been a change on forums since I was able to use the username I'm certain I've registered with before.

Nice to meet you all (again)

Billy.

I am learning CryENGINE 3 too, but not to gain some money. Yep, KSP runs on Unity.

Nice to meet you (short )
